data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Carl is a young child, and loves playing with his toys. Just ____ night ____ mom ____ him a new ____ to ____. It ____ bright, flashing ____, ____ buttons ____ can ____ to ____ music. Carl has been using it all morning!
data.partBlankContent: Carl is a young child, and loves playing with his toys. Just la__ night h__ mom bou___ him a new th___ to pl__. It h__ bright, flashing lig___, a__ buttons y__ can pr___ to pl__ music. Carl has been using it all morning!
data.fullContent: Carl is a young child, and loves playing with his toys. Just last night his mom bought him a new thing to play. It has bright, flashing lights, and buttons you can press to play music. Carl has been using it all morning!
data.answer: 卡尔是个小孩子，喜欢玩他的玩具。就在昨晚，他妈妈给他买了一个新的玩具。它有明亮的、闪烁的灯和你可以按下播放音乐的按钮。卡尔整个早上都在用它!
